name: DnD Adventure: Demon's Choice
description:
You're a succubus...

You're Azizella, Binder of Souls, and you have just escaped the Abyss. Now, a free demon, you seek to outwit the fiends that hunt you as you plot your own rise to ultimate power.

The game includes the complete story of Demon's Choice in 11 chapters. No additional purchase.

Features:


Zero learning curve. Read the story and make decisions.

Outcomes are determined by decisions you make.

More than 334,000 words for 20+ hours of gameplay.

Stay alive and sane. Use your magic and gather gold!

Score and rank at the end.

Ambient sounds and music.

Comfort options: 8 different fonts to choose from. Tweak the font size, screen luminosity and scroll speed to your needs without restarting.

Auto & Cloud Saves: Restart where you stopped from any of your devices.

A game by Delight Games & Cold Coffee Studio.
Story written by Sam Landstrom.
